channel.title: POWER BLAST Podcast
channel.description:
IT’S NEVER TOO LATE!
Getting fit and healthy may seem like something that was possible when you were younger. Not true! If you read my story you know how it’s possible to make changes at any age.

These podcasts cover topics that helped me succeed with P90, P90X, Chalean Extreme, Insanity and more. These shows include poking fun at fitness, talking about eating and diet, chatting with special guests, learning about other Beachbody programs and discussing things regarding overall health and well-being!

Enjoy these video podcasts.
Perry Tinsley
Independent Beachbody Coach

item.title: Power Blast June 2, 2012 (Episode 272) Three Weight Loss Plans
item.description:
I got to thinking about three weight loss plans I have tried in the past to get my eating and weight back on track, especially after a celebration weekend, long vacation, or when I have let habits slip a bit. I want to share with you what I have tried and those results. If you find yourself in the same boat or are wanting to kick-start a weight loss plan these quick plans may give you the ideal path!

item.title: Power Blast March 17, 2012 (Episode 261) P90X2 P. A. P. Upper Workout
item.description:
www.putyourselffirst.com | www.TinsleyFitness.com
The P.A.P. Upper workout in P90X2 is all about post activation potentiation. The sequence of exercises called, complexes” improve performance by combining high load strength movements with similar plyometric/ballistic movements. Supposedly,these workouts are far superior in developing athletic power to either resistance training or plyometric training alone. I just find them fun and challenging! Rows, pull ups, plyo pushups and med ball planks... it’s in there!
 Fuel your workouts! Get Shakeology risk free at http://www.incredibleshake.com

item.title: Power Blast October 1, 2011 (Episode 237) Be Persistent to Live Healthy
item.description:
www.putyourselffirst.com
When you start taking your first step on your journey, the road seem so long and daunting that it's easy to make little excuses along the way. Life has its obstacles. Life has its challenges. Life throws us curves and puts us off balance. So, what is it that gets a person results?

It's being persistent! That's the thing that you put your mindset and intentions to focus upon. It's being focused no matter what is going on in this crazy world around you! It's wanting it badly! We all know it's easy to give in to external pressures, stresses and drama in the world. That stuff can eat us up! But when you look those obstacles square in the eyes the find a away around, you ultimately succeed. Your focus and attitude to press forward must be unstoppable.

item.description:
www.putyourselffirst.com
It’s no secret that getting that chiseled, sculpted body takes time, consistent workouts and a variety of exercises. That’s only part of the equation.

You see, getting that lean looking body takes “kitchen work.” As Tony Horton says, “Great abs are made in the kitchen.” Setting yourself up for success with what you eat and how you eat is going to melt away the flab and reveal all your hard work. The thing is, it needs to become sustainable and habits for a lifetime otherwise old habits will creep back in. Here are some tips to help you.

item.description:
www.putyourselffirst.com
The Super Workout at the Team Beachbody Coach Summit 2011 was off the hook. If every burned about 500 calories, I’d say over one million calories were burned! There were seven celebrity trainers that led the workout including Tony Horton, Shaun T, Chalene Johnson, Brett Hoebel, Leandro Carvalho, Debbie Siebers and Donna Richardson!
